meanings: (남에게 어떤 일을 하게 하다) make[have, let](sb do), get (sb to do), (원하지 않는 일을 강제로) force[compel] (sb to do), (지...
have the servant comb the dog

meanings.meaning: put a person to the indignity of doing

vlive.korean: 다현이가 시켜서... She ordered it. 듣기 View video TWICE : 모챙TV🍑🍓
왜 다 각자 메뉴 시켜서 먹는 거지? Why are you having different menu? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이랑 저녁 먹을래요??
vlive.english: Why are you having different menu?

vlive.korean: 강 대리 아들 시켜서 한 건가? Did he ask assistant manager Kang's son to draw it? 듣기 View video SF9 : [FOR FANTASY] 셒구상사 (SF9 SANGSA) EP.01
vlive.english: Did he ask assistant manager Kang's son to draw it?

vlive.korean: 게임을 좀 변형시켜서 - 약간 그 게임을 묻고 더블로 가에 연결을 시켜서 하면... So it's like making our own games. - Okay. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.27 세봉이의 상상은 현실이 된다 #1
vlive.english: So it's like making our own games. - Okay.

vlive.korean: 보쌈 도시락 시켜서 김치를 먹어봤는데 맛있기만 하더만! I ordered the boiled pork lunch box and ate the kimchi. It was good! 듣기 View video SF9 : 나브이앱하고라스볼거야
vlive.english: I ordered the boiled pork lunch box and ate the kimchi. It was good!

examples.korean: We’ve had the house painted. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 (사람을 시켜서) 집에 페이트칠을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ve had the house painted. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ll have a duplicate key cut. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 (사람을 시켜서) 열쇠를 복사하겠다[만들겠다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll have a duplicate key cut. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They had had their pet dog stuffed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 자신들의 애완견을 (남에게 시켜서) 박제로 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He had a heart tattooed on his shoulder. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 (사람을 시켜서) 어깨에 하트 모양의 문신을 새겼다[그는 어깨에 하트 모양의 문신이 있었다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
